Header.title: WELCOME
Header.paragraph: My name is Marc Villareal. I am a BEng Software Engineering Graduate from Queen's University Belfast...

About.paragraph: I'm originally from Cavite, Philippines but my family emigrated to Belfast, Northern Ireland when I was two years old. I'm studying BEng Software Engineering at Queen's University Belfast. I was Treasurer of Queen's Filipino Society for two years and an hall of fame member for Queen's Esport's Society.
About.paragraph2: I'm always looking for ways to develop myself, and I'm fascinated by new technologies and love coding. Working in a fast-paced, lively workplace has helped me enhance my teamwork and communication abilities while also providing me with customer service experience.
About.paragraph3: I am also a self-directed learner who uses online learning tools and personal projects to hone my skills. I am committed to completing projects on time and to a high standard.
About.paragraph4: I enjoyed being a Placement Software Engineer at Civica in the Belfast Office. And through my experience working with end users in past projects and as an Engineer in Civica, I have developed an interest in Cloud and Forward Facing roles. But, I also really enjoyed the engineering rigour behind being an Software Engineer.

Testimonials.text: I had the pleasure to work with Marc on a multiple university projects. He is a responsible individual and a great team player, as well as an exceptional developer. His expertise and knowledge would add value to any team.
Testimonials.name: John Hetherington, Placement Software Engineer Civica

Testimonials.text: Marc worked in my team as a placement Software Engineer. He was able to pick up new technologies quickly which helped make good progress with his project. Being fully remote wasn't a problem, he was pro-active in making new connections and got on very well with the team. The GeNI project we developed was a real success with positive feedback from other teams when he presented in our internal conference. I highly recommend Marc
Testimonials.name: Ryan McKeever, Software Engineer Civica

Testimonials.text: Marc is a great programmer who can meet big deadlines in a group project. A great team player during our hackathon sessions and always had innovative ideas to work with.
Testimonials.name: Lorenzo James Cueto, Software Engineer Intern at Signifyd
